versos: (covert) Psalm 32:7 - "You are my hiding place; you will protect me from trouble and surround me with songs of deliverance.";;;
(offence) Hebrews 12:15: See to it that no one falls short of the grace of God and that no bitter root grows up to cause trouble and defile many.;;;

(abishai) 2 Samuel 21:17 - But abishai son of Zeruiah came to David's rescue; he struck the Philistine down and killed him. Then David's men swore to him, saying, "Never again will you go out with us to battle, so that the lamp of Israel will not be extinguished.";;;
(zeruiah) 2 Samuel 2:18 - Now the three sons of zeruiah were there
(joab) 2 Samuel 10:7 - When David heard about it
(sleeping) 1 Thessalonians 5:10 - "He died for us so that, whether we are awake or asleep, we may live together with him.";;;
(kishon) Judges 5:21 - "The river kishon swept them away, the age-old river, the river kishon. March on, my soul; be strong";;;
(abdon) Judges 12:14 - He had forty sons and thirty grandsons
(fool) Psalm 14:1 - "The fool says in his heart, 'There is no God.'";;;

(gilboa) 2 Samuel 1:21 - "Ye mountains of gilboa, let there be no dew, neither let there be rain, upon you, nor fields of offerings: for there the shield of the mighty is vilely cast away, the shield of Saul, as though he had not been anointed with oil.";;;

(twilight) Ezekiel 12:6 - "As they watch, lift your baggage to your shoulder and go out into the darkness. Cover your face so that you cannot see the land, for I have made you a sign to the people of Israel.";;;

(leaned) 1 Samuel 4:18 - "As soon as he mentioned the ark of God, Eli fell backward off his chair by the side of the gate. His neck was broken and he died, for he was an old man, and he was heavy. He had judged Israel forty years.";;;
(river) Genesis 2:10 - "A river watering the garden flowed from Eden...";;;
(swifter) Job 9:25 - "My days are swifter than a runner; they flee away, they see no good.";;;
(lions) Psalm 104:21 - "The lions roar for their prey and seek their food from God.";;;
(delights) Psalm 37:4 - "Take delight in the Lord, and he will give you the desires of your heart.";;;
(ish) Genesis 2:23 - "The man said, This is now bone of my bones and flesh of my flesh; she shall be called woman, for she was taken out of man.";;;
